text: Siġġiewi (, ), also called by its title Città Ferdinand, is a city and a local council in the Southern Region of Malta. It is the third largest council in Malta after Rabat and Mellieħa respectively. It is near Mdina, the ancient capital city of Malta, and away from Valletta. It is the home of 8367 inhabitants as of March 2014. ==References== Category:Cities in Malta
title: Siġġiewi
